Name: Pablo Suarez
HeaderDesc3: Passionate about Videogame Programming, and Software Design and Development.
Bio: Hi! My name is Pablo Suarez, I'm 22 years-old, and right now I'm on my fifth year at the University of the Andes with Systems and Computational Engineering as my major. My strong suit and my biggest passion is software design and development, and although my skills are oriented towards the back-end more than the front-end, I'm deeply interested in both. I also love videogame development and I hope to eventually make a career out of it.
SkillMsg: In general, I shine the most when it comes to Software Development. Moreover, despite the fact that UI/UX Design isn't my strong suit, I'm still capable of contributing and giving feedback on this matter from my personal experience.
ContactMsg: Contact me! All my socials are open to offers, questions, comments, etc. You can use this form ton send an email or contact me directly through any of the links in this website's footer or in the header below my name.
FormSuccess: Your message has been sent. Thank you!
